name: Space Drift: Guardian of Earth
description:
• This game gives realistic experience of space piloting physics with fluid controls with time you'll build your skills how you save the Earth drifting through space making it one of the best space invader game .
• you have unlimited blaster Ammo how ever missiles are activated with you pick big green Missile ammo
• once you have picked your missiles
• For difficult times by tapping on missiles button blinking a red/blue blinker on it, multiple missile will launch.
• blaster shots in aim while missiles are guided , they'll follow asteroid.
• Every Asteroid explosions is different
• Very nice and elegent Graphics
• 60 FPS
• Charming, giving hours of entertainment to you and your friends
